ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Bag of the Tinkerers
ygData.msgSnippet: This information is incorrect.  I own 2 of these bags and they hold absolutely everything, most importantly the aqualungs and rebreathers that I keep in stock.
ygData.messageBody:
This information is incorrect. I own 2 of these bags
and they hold absolutely everything, most importantly
the aqualungs and rebreathers that I keep in stock.

I think your information is just dated, they used to
not hold everything, but that was fixed about 5 to 6
months ago, when the box stopped dropping.

Gazamel
50 Gnome Warrior
Solusek Ro

>
> the bag of the tinkerers does not hold extra large
> stuff such as a shiny
> brass halberd or the giant polar bear pelt quest
> thing where as the box of
> Abu-kar does
>
> Fixer
> 50 enchanter
> Cazic Thule
>
>
